Detailed Description

template<class IM_TYPE, class STEPPER_TYPE> template class XVSSD

XVSSD.

Author(s):
Greg Hager, Sam Lang
Version:
Id: XVSSD.h,v 1.26 2005/07/23 21:32:38 cvsuser Exp

The XVSSD class provides an interface between the SSD tracking algorithm, and the design of the XVision2 generic tracking structure (XVFeature).

See also:
XVSSDStepper
